blurbs.title: simple access, when you need it

copy.text: when you book and pay for your locker, a unique door access code is created just for you. each customer gets a different access code that will work during daytime hours for the duration of the locker booking.

every time your code is used to access the storage facility, we will send you an email so that you are aware of anyone accessing your locker, if you have shared your door access code with family or trusted friends.

individual lockers are secured with your own padlock. only you can decide who will have copies of your locker key and will have access to your secure locker. we do not keep copies of keys for booked lockers. if your keys are lost or stolen, we can remove the lock for a fee of bgn 20.00 but the lock will be destroyed.

you may access your locker between the hours of 8:00 and 22:00. please be considerate of the neighbours and do not make excessive noise if you need access to your locker after sunset and before sunrise. night access is restricted in consideration of our residential neighbours.

blurbs.title: secure, private lockers
copy: our secure, private lockers give you complete peace of mind for your belongings. the facility is monitored 24 hours a day by a comprehensive cctv system. choose from our baby (small), mama (medium) and papa (large) bears lairs. each locker is secured with a lock that only you have keys for.

blurbs.title: adaptive pricing that always gives you, our valued customer, the best deal
copy: we will always give you the best possible price for the time you need storage facilities. our pricing is tiered to give you complete flexibility. let's consider an example:

jane thinks she needs a locker for two months after selling her apartment. she plans to return to bansko and collect her belongings with a van. however, two months come and go and jane is busy and doesn't get the chance to drive to bansko and collect her things. lucky for jane, bears lairs adapts jane's price plan to accomodate her busy life. jane has paid for two months of storage in a medium sized locker at the monthly rate of 100 lev but when she reaches her third month, she is only billed the difference of 50 lev, for the 3 month plan which costs 250 lev. jane never needed to worry about which locker plan to buy, because bears lairs values her business and is happy to reward her extended custom, by giving her the 3 month pricing plan without her ever having to think about it.

blurbs.title: economical bicycle and motorcycle storage
copy: we've got your bikes covered too. if you just want an economical solution to keep your bike indoors and out of the wet weather, we offer bicycle and motorcycle storage in a shared, secure indoor space.

blurbs.title: a strong, secure and dry facility that is partially underground

copy.text: we are located at the southern tip of bansko, close to the mountain.
our facility is the solid concrete structure directly below the tennis courts in front of royal bansko aparthotel.
the self-storage lockers are behind the three white steel doors on the floor immediately below the tennis courts.
